name: carbos
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases Speed effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Raises the stat SPEED of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the base SPEED stat of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A nutritious drink for POKéMON. It raises the base SPEED stat of one POKéMON.
